Creates an instance of the Newton-Raphson Algorithm to determine the Maximum Likelihood Estimator for the Pitman Model

Parameters:
u - total number of entries in the sample data set
n - size of sample
eqClasses - The number of equivalence class sizes (keys) and corresponding frequency (values)

getSolution

public double[] getSolution(double[] initialValue)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Returns the iterated solution of a non-linear equation obtained by the Newton-Raphson algorithm.

Parameters:
initialValue - the vector of initial values.
Returns:
the vector of solutions.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the first derivative matrix of the object functions is singular.
